sources.name: stations
sources.query: SELECT ID, Station_Name, Latitude, Longitude, Zone, Postcode FROM neo4jbusinessdev.london_transport.london_stations

custom_query.name: Tube Lines
custom_query.query: UNWIND $rows as row MATCH (a:Station), (b:Station) WHERE a.name = row.From_Station AND b.name = row.To_Station CALL apoc.create.relationship(a, toUpper(row.Tube_Line), {}, b) YIELD rel as rel1 CALL apoc.create.relationship(b, toUpper(row.Tube_Line), {}, a) YIELD rel as rel2 RETURN rel1, rel2;
